item.title: Mandelbrot images
item.description: GithubÂ Deployed The Mandelbrot Explorer Overview The goal of this project was to implement an interactive explorer for the mandelbrot set. It’s definition is very simple. A complex number c is considered to be in the mandelbrot set if the iteration $$\forall c \in \mathbb{C}: \\ ~ \\ z_{0}=0 \\ z_{i+1}=z_{i}^2+c$$ converges to a stationary value. Coloring all the convergent points, gives a picture like this If instead, the above equation diverges, we can color that point based on how fast it diverges.
